title: Shiver
description: ***This is a short teaser story which includes the first two chapters of Prowl***Mackenzie Smith has been plagued with horrible nightmares since she was a small child. In them there is an evil voice, whispering deadly threats. Only now she is seventeen and the man from her dreams is making appearances while she is awake.Is it just a figment of her imagination or something more sinister?
author: Amber Garza
